segments.text: Mr . Lee , all ready to check out ? We ’ Ve already prepared your bill , and housekeeping has done a quick check of the room . How will you be paying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like to use my Master Card , if I could . Hey , wait a minute ! This is a bit more than I expected . Why is it so high ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The bill is itemized , so take some time to look through it and make sure we ’ Ve charged you for the correct services . Most of your extra charges were for phone calls and room service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s this here – “ house stock ” ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s the mini-bar . Each day we check what ’ s missing and restock it . The items you consume are put on your bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had no idea – and look at these charges for movies !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Those are for pay-per-view movies . Each time you selected a movie , the entertainment system prompted you to confirm that you really wanted it , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that ’ s right . But I had no idea I would be charged for all this . Thank goodness my company will let me reimburse all this .
segments.speaker: S2
